exchangeLuckyballComment: O ti rà rẹ ojuami fun a orire Ball.
inviteLuckyballComment: O ti gba Bọọlu Orire fun pipe ọrẹ kan.
purchaseGiftCardByPoint: O ti rà awọn aaye fun kaadi ẹbun kan.
purchaseProductByPoint: O ti rà awọn aaye rẹ pada fun ọjà.
luckyDrawUseBallComment: O ti lo Orire Ball lati tẹ Lucky Draw.
winLotteryPointComment: O ti fun ọ ni awọn aaye fun gbigba Lotto.
partnerMailContents1: Jọwọ ṣayẹwo awọn iwe aṣẹ ti o nilo fun ifọwọsi alabaṣepọ ki o fi esi ranṣẹ pẹlu faili ti a so!
partnerMailContents3:
Jọwọ so ẹda kaadi ID tabi iwe irinna rẹ pọ
lati mọ daju rẹ alabaṣepọ ká idanimo.
partnerMailContents5:
Jọwọ ṣayẹwo awọn iwe aṣẹ ati alaye ti a beere
fun alakosile alabaṣepọ ki o si fi wa a esi!
partnerMailContents6: (Iru iṣowo, nọmba ipa ọna, nọmba akọọlẹ, orukọ akọkọ ti dimu akọọlẹ, orukọ arin, orukọ idile, nọmba foonu alagbeka olugba, ati bẹbẹ lọ)
partnerMailContents8:
Jọwọ fi nọmba foonu kan ranṣẹ si wa nibiti o le de ọdọ rẹ
lati ṣe ibaraẹnisọrọ pẹlu alabaṣepọ rẹ.
partnerMailContents9:
Jọwọ fi esi rẹ ranṣẹ nipasẹ imeeli si partner@buflexz.com .
Lẹhin ti ẹgbẹ iṣiṣẹ ṣayẹwo idahun naa, ibojuwo alabaṣepọ ati ifọwọsi yoo ni ilọsiwaju.
authMailContents1: A yoo fi nọmba ijẹrisi imeeli ranṣẹ si ọ.
authMailContents3: Bọtini ìfàṣẹsí ti jade fun ìfàṣẹsí imeeli.
authMailContents4:
Jọwọ tẹ nọmba ijẹrisi oni-nọmba 6 taara sinu ijẹrisi naa
window laarin app tabi daakọ ati lẹẹmọ nọmba ijẹrisi naa.
authMailContents5:
Imeeli yii wa fun fifiranṣẹ nikan.
Awọn idahun ko ṣee ṣe, nitorina ti o ba ni ibeere eyikeyi tabi awọn aibalẹ,
jọwọ kan si wa nipasẹ ile-iṣẹ alabara laarin ohun elo BUFLEXZ.
